title: Bug 116744 Dynamic text content type has no effect
OB: The dynamic text content type is not affecting the displayed contents of a db field with different types of content.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:

1. Populate a db field with three types of content:
   a) HTML text within <html></html> tag
   b) HTML fragments not within <html> tag
   c) Text with RTF tags
2. Use a dynamic text element to display the contents of this field.
3. Observe that the dynamic text content type has no effect on the displayed contents.
